thread.title: Mavenspire Named to CRN Fast Growth 150 List
thread.title_full: Mavenspire Named to CRN Fast Growth 150 List - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: Mavenspire Named to CRN Fast Growth 150 List
text:
Mavenspire Named to CRN Fast Growth 150 List
Annapolis, MD, October 16, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Mavenspire has been named to CRN’s prestigious Fast Growth 150 list, an honor given to IT solution providers across the country who have demonstrated significant revenue growth over the last two years. Mavenspire ranked 19 out of 150 on the list making the firm one of fastest growing solution providers based on gross revenue from 2012 to 2014. This was a significant increase from 2014’s ranking of 49.
In a turbulent IT economy, Mavenspire has shown exceptional prowess in growing their operations and constantly providing essential services to their customers. Mavenspire President and CEO, Michael Tanenhaus, attributes the company’s growth to its constant attention to shifting technological trends and the its ability to specialize in different aspects of technology.
As Mavenspire looks to the future, Michael Tanenhaus is in high spirits stating, “I fully expect that we will have those same awards moving up in position in the next year’s announcements as well. I do not see any change in our trajectory.”
Robert Faletra, CEO of The Channel Company and publisher of CRN states, “Cloud computing, mobile and big data technologies are making the industry both more exciting and more challenging than it’s ever been. Solution providers recognized in CRN’s Fast Growth 150 list are rising to meet the challenge and are thriving as a result. We are pleased to recognize these firms as leaders in today’s IT channel.”
The Fast Growth 150 list is highlighted in the October issue of CRN and can be viewed online at http://crn.com/fastgrowth .
About The Channel Company:
The Channel Company is the channel community's trusted authority for growth and innovation, with established brands including CRN, XChange Events, IPED, and SharedVue. For more than three decades, we have leveraged our proven and leading-edge platforms to deliver prescriptive sales and marketing solutions for the technology channel. The Channel Company provides Communication, Recruitment, Engagement, Enablement, Demand Generation and Intelligence services to drive technology partnerships. Learn more at www.thechannelcompany.com.
About Mavenspire:
Mavenspire’s experienced team provides data center solutions to large enterprises and mid-sized businesses all over the world. Our proven process combines expert assessment, architecture, design and implementation with the best-in-class data center solutions available today. We work with you to understand your goals, solve the tough problems and create a plan for your desired outcomes. Our goal is to be your partner every step of the way and inspire the future of your business.
Learn more at http://www.mavenspire.com
